title: GENERAL
fullText:
In addition to the requirements specified in Clause 6.2.8, the installation of the battery system or BESS shall be in accordance with the following:
(a) For a ground mounted battery system or BESS, the ground structure and type shall have structural strength to support the battery system or BESS weight.
(b) For a wall-mounted battery system or BESS, the structural integrity of the wall shall be able to withstand the weight of the battery system or BESS.
